message.original: この臭いを忘れるな オークの接近は臭いでわかる
message.translation: Don't forget this smell. An orc's approach is betrayed by their stench.

message.original: いつか鼻がバカになるだろうが――
message.translation: In time, your nose will grow accustomed to it.

message.original: その頃まで生きのびていれば オークごときにやられることはない
message.translation: Though if you can survive that long, an orc will be as a trifling foe.

message.original: グリッテン砦だ 走るぞ
急いで―― ほら、オークちゃんが逃げちゃうよ！
message.translation: Come along now, afore the orcs can make their retreat!
